00049 class line_edit : public QLineEdit {
00050   Q_OBJECT
00051   public:
00052     line_edit(QWidget* _parent = 0) { _n++; _i = _n; }
00053   signals:
00054   void focusIn(int _i);
00055   public slots:
00056   protected:
00057     void focusInEvent(QFocusEvent * _event) { emit focusIn(_i); }
00058   private:
00059   int _i;
00060   static int _n;
00061 };
